q: Departure of Andy Coulson leaves David Cameron sad but not distraught " God you lot are clutching at straws... The whole of the last govt were shady but they didn't resign en mass. @pavis God you lot are clutching at straws... In the words of my less politically astute friend, Andy Coulson who? Make no mistake, this is only the start, this has further to run. The hunter has become the hunted

I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night," Zahi Hawass , chairperson of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. Iraq. The differences were not personal, Donald Rumsfeld says. He recalls receiving a book that Henry Kissinger had written, with the inscription, "To an occasional adversary and a permanent friend." When I started working on the book, Henry Kissinger said, "You tell it like it was.' We differed on some issues, and there"s nothing wrong with that. It was professional and healthy, Donald Rumsfeld says. Working on the book meant second-guessing his memory.
